{{Infobox Pokéball |name = Nestball |image = [[File:Nestball.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Nestball''. |price = Variable |catchTime = 1.25s |catchRate = Variable (Higher on earlier routes, see [[Nestball#Rates|Rates]] Below) |location =
*[[Nestball#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Nestball''' is a type of [[Pokéballs|Pokéball]]. It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Pokéball active and there is a remaining supply in the Pokéball selector. ==Details== A specialized Pokéball to capture Pokémon with, it provides an increased catch rate on earlier routes. ==Rates== Rates are determined by the highest unlocked region (e.g.: When Johto is unlocked, highest route order used in 48). {| class="wikitable" |+ Nestball Catch Rates |- ! Region Route Order !! Catch chance
(+5%, Equal to Greatball) !! Catch chance
(+10%, Equal to Ultraball) !! Catch chance
(+15%) |- | [[Route_Statistics#Kanto|Kanto Route Order]] || 5 || 3 || 2 |- | [[Route_Statistics#Johto|Johto Route Order]] || 10 || 5 || 4 |- | [[Route_Statistics#Hoenn|Hoenn Route Order]] || 33 || 17 || 11 |- | [[Route_Statistics#Sinnoh|Sinnoh Route Order]] || 68 || 34 || 23 |- | [[Route_Statistics#Unova|Unova Route Order]] || 109 || 55 || 37 |- | [[Route_Statistics#Kalos|Kalos Route Order]] || 159 || 80 || 53 |} [[File:Nestball_Catch_Rate_Graph.png|X-axis: Route Order
Y-axis: Catch rate|250px]] ==Acquisition== {{Loot/head‎|Pokéballs}} {{LootItem|Rocket Game Corner|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Magma Hideout|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Aqua Hideout|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Victory Road Unova|Epic}} {{LootItem|Pinwheel Forest|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Reflection Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Lush Jungle|Epic}} |} |}
